review: After three days since I received my fire stick, it still doesn't work. Three different phone calls for help and no one could help me get past the request for a password (not their fault. All tried their best) This was supposed to be an easy to install item. No instruction booklet, so if you're having problems, you're out of luck. Have high blood pressure, and had heart surgery this spring. Didn't need the aggravation. I'd return the item if I didn't  have to re box it and drive somewhere to mail it. Instead it's in the garbage where it belongs. Oh well, caveat emptor. While I'm at it, why is it so hard to leave a complaint about an order. I've wasted three or four hours on this issue. Cmon Amazon , you can do better. I'm a loooong time prime customer and hate to complain, but there it is. Easy to install? Not even close. Call me disappointed.
author: Donald L. Campbell Jr.

review: I got this to try to talk my grandma into getting rid of her cable but she wasn't for it. So I used if for a couple of months and loved it! I watch mainly netflix or amazon primes tv and it worked great! Then I got grandma a tv in the living room and showed her how to use it and wrote it down, and she learned and now you can't pry her away from it! This is a great TV stick for the price!

review: Met our expectations. Very fast and easy set up and operation.  The only reason I give it 4 stars is that there is occasional tracking. But I knew that might the case with the lower price option and it may be partly due to our Internet service. Bottom line, for the price you can't beat it!
